title: About
description: Learn more about Constructor Script, our mission, and the team building modern site experiences.

content.text: Constructor Script empowers creators to launch dynamic, content-rich sites without code-heavy overhead. We focus on intuitive tooling, flexibility, and reliable performance so teams can share their stories faster.
From configurable themes to an extensible data layer, Constructor Script provides the building blocks needed to publish blogs, documentation, and marketing pages with ease.
We are a distributed team of developers, designers, and storytellers committed to crafting polished digital experiences. Collaboration, curiosity, and empathy guide our work.
Have a question or want to collaborate? Reach out at hello@constructor-script.com and we will get back to you shortly.
